recommendations.fix: Add "seller" role to user via WordPress admin or WP-CLI: wp user add-role 3 seller
This capability should be granted automatically with seller role. Check Dokan settings.
Enable the vendor store via Dokan > Vendors > Edit Vendor > Enable Selling
